summary: A custodian of records declaration certifying FedEx Express invoices from October 2002 billed to Jeffrey Epstein at 457 Madison Avenue, New York, as business records for use in an investigation and prosecution by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The FedEx Express invoices are billed to Jeffrey Epstein at 457 Madison Avenue, New York, NY, as part of records provided to law enforcement.

events.title: FedEx invoice billing to Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: FedEx Express invoice numbered 4-397-85573 was issued and billed to Jeffrey Epstein at his New York address.

keyFacts: A custodian of records certified FedEx Express invoices from October 2002 as business records for a law enforcement investigation.
The invoices were billed to Jeffrey Epstein at 457 Madison Avenue, New York, NY.
The records were provided to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York in connection with an investigation and prosecution.
The declaration was made under penalty of perjury to authenticate the records under Federal Rules of Evidence 902(11) and 803(6).
